metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'imprimerie de J.G. Clousier, rue Saint-Jacques
metadata.description: Prospectus for a French translation by Jean-Louis Blavet of Adam Smith's "The theory of moral sentiments."
"A Paris, chez Valade, libraire, rue Saint-Jacques, vis-à-vis celle des Mathurins"--P. [1]
Includes brief notices for three other titles sold by Valade
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
